articles.title: The 'Barbie' movie is about selling Barbie's redemption - Insider
articles.description: The 'Barbie' movie is wrapped in the language of feminism, but it's ultimately not about that. It's about selling Barbie to women who reject her.
articles.content:
Spoilers ahead for "Barbie."
